notes.title: February 2017
notes.notes:
- Original version of the game written as a static website with jQuery. 
- ivosjatek.hu domain bought.

notes.title: January 2020
notes.notes: - jQuery libraries replaced with React JS.

notes.title: March 2020
notes.notes:
- Localization of the navigation menu, Contact page, Rules page and game buttons. 
- English card pack translated and added. 
- National flags added as language selector buttons. 
- Number of left cards shown. 
- Release notes added.
